verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> makes a <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H1>father;<s%> but a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> brings <S%H8424>grief<s%> to his <S%H517>mother.<s%>
<S%H214>Treasures<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H6666>nothing,<s%> but righteousness <S%H5337>delivers<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will not <S%H7456>allow<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to go <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> but he thrusts <S%H1920>away<s%> the <S%H1942>desire<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
He becomes <S%H7326>poor<s%> who <S%H6213>works<s%> with a <S%H7423>lazy<s%> <S%H3709>hand,<s%> but the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> brings <S%H6238>wealth.<s%>

He who <S%H103>gathers<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> is a <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> but he who <S%H7290>sleeps<s%> during the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> who causes <S%H954>shame.<s%>
<S%H1293>Blessings<s%> are on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> but <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
The <S%H2143>memory<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H1293>blessed,<s%> but the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7537>rot.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3947>accept<s%> <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> but a <S%H8193>chattering<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> will <S%H3832>fall.<s%>
He who <S%H3212>walks<s%> <S%H8537>blamelessly<s%> <S%H3212>walks<s%> <S%H983>surely,<s%> but he who <S%H6140>perverts<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> will be found <S%H3045>out.<s%>
One <S%H7169>winking<s%> with the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5414>causes<s%> <S%H6094>sorrow,<s%> but a <S%H8193>chattering<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> will <S%H3832>fall.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H4726>spring<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> but <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H8135>Hatred<s%> stirs <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H4090>strife,<s%> but <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> all <S%H6588>wrongs.<s%>

<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> on the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of him who has <S%H995>discernment,<s%> but a <S%H7626>rod<s%> is for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of him who is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
<S%H2450>Wise<s%> men lay <S%H6845>up<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
The rich <S%H6223>man<s%>'s <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city.<s%> The <S%H4288>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is their <S%H7389>poverty.<s%>
The <S%H6468>labor<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> leads to <S%H2416>life.<s%> The <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> leads to <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
He is in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> who <S%H8104>heeds<s%> <S%H4148>correction,<s%> but he who <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> leads others <S%H8582>astray.<s%>
He who <S%H3680>hides<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%> has <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%> He who <S%H3318>utters<s%> a <S%H1681>slander<s%> is a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> there is no <S%H2308>lack<s%> of <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> but he who <S%H2820>restrains<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> does <S%H7919>wisely.<s%>
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is like <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver.<s%> The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is of little <S%H4592>worth.<s%>
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> but the <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H2638>lack<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1293>blessing<s%> brings <S%H6238>wealth,<s%> and he <S%H3254>adds<s%> no trouble to <S%H6089>it.<s%>
It is a <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H7814>pleasure<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2154>wickedness,<s%> but <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%>'s pleasure.
What the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4034>fear,<s%> will <S%H935>overtake<s%> <S%H8378>them,<s%> but the desire of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H5414>granted.<s%>
When the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5674>passes,<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is no <S%H6662>more;<s%> but the righteous stand <S%H3247>firm<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
As <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to the <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> and as <S%H6227>smoke<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> so is the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> to those who send <S%H7971>him.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3254>prolongs<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> but the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7114>shortened.<s%>
The <S%H8431>prospect<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H8057>joy,<s%> but the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H6>perish.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> to the <S%H8537>upright,<s%> but it is a <S%H4288>destruction<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>removed,<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will not <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> brings <S%H5107>forth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> but the <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will be cut <S%H3772>off.<s%>
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> what is <S%H7522>acceptable,<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H8419>perverse.<s%>
